entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
